channel.title: Explaining why clients crash on Vista and Windows 7
channel.description:
(sorry for my very rubish English)
Hi,do you also have that annoying crash ? after you clicked 2 times in your client?
Well i also had the problem once tho,and im here to explain why.
Most run applications look like this: [code]Quote: @echo off Start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit[/code] This only works With XP or lower. why? because this piece of code follows this path: programfiles/java/jre6...... Now We are on a OS that haves a Programfiles (x86). So this code should work.
[code]@echo off cls "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit pause[/code]
If it still doesnt work here some envoirement variables you might want to add. CLASSPATH [code]C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin[/code] CLASSPATH [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code] QTJAVA [code]C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip[/code]
If you still have problems with your client please contact me and i will update this topic.
